<style type="text/css"><!-- /*
/* ==============================================
# Name        : wdbloog 
# Version     : 8.0
# Environment : Blogger
# Category    : special design
# Language    : Arabic
# Created by  : Abdo Hegazy
# Updated     : 17,09,2016
# URL         : https://khamsat.com/user/abdo-abd-alrazzaq
# =============================================== */

<Variable name="bg.color" description="لون الخلفية" type="background"
color="#ddd" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/>

<Variable name="a.color" description="لون الروابط" type="color" default="#343434" value="#343434"/>
<Variable name="s.color" description="اللون الرئيسي" type="color" default="#EF5350" value="#EF5350"/>

<Group selector=".header-top" description="القائمة العلوية">
<Variable name="htb.color" description="لون الخلفية" type="color" default="#121212" value="#121212"/>
<Variable name="htba.color" description="لون الروابط" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
</Group>

<Group selector=".main-menu" description="القائمة الرئيسية">
<Variable name="mb.color" description="لون الخلية" type="color" default="#131313" value="#131313"/>
<Variable name="mba.color" description="لون الروابط" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
</Group>

<Group selector=".sidebar" description="القائمة الجانبية">
<Variable name="sb.color" description="لون خلفية العنوان" type="color" default="#f7f7f7" value="#f7f7f7"/>
<Variable name="sbt.color" description="لون العنوان" type="color" default="#444" value="#444444"/>
<Variable name="sbw.color" description="لون خلفية الصندوق" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/>
</Group>

/* ============= Fonts ============= */
/* Norican */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Norican';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: local('Norican Regular'), local('Norican-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/norican/v4/U5gsdSLZ2HqelLrac75mCPY6323mHUZFJMgTvxaG2iE.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0100-024F, U+1E00-1EFF, U+20A0-20AB, U+20AD-20CF, U+2C60-2C7F, U+A720-A7FF;
}
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Norican';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: local('Norican Regular'), local('Norican-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/norican/v4/VzIcpMyXd3byQV_dQZKq3g.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215;
}
/* Droid Arabic Naskh */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Droid Arabic Naskh';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Regular.eot);
  src: url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Regular.eot?#iefix) format('embedded-opentype'),
       url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Regular.woff2) format('woff2'),
       url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Regular.woff) format('woff'),
       url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Regular.ttf) format('truetype');
}
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Droid Arabic Naskh';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 700;
  src: url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Bold.eot);
  src: url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Bold.eot?#iefix) format('embedded-opentype'),
       url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Bold.woff2) format('woff2'),
       url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Bold.woff) format('woff'),
       url(//fonts.gstatic.com/ea/droidarabicnaskh/v7/DroidNaskh-Bold.ttf) format('truetype');
}

/* arabic */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Changa';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 300;
  src: local('Changa Light'), local('Changa-Light'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/changa/v2/zIGCu8O19pSG8koisGk1OBJtnKITppOI_IvcXXDNrsc.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0600-06FF, U+200C-200E, U+2010-2011, U+FB50-FDFF, U+FE80-FEFC;
}
/* latin-ext */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Changa';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 300;
  src: local('Changa Light'), local('Changa-Light'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/changa/v2/SXJ613HsBrxfKjdFGqDd4xJtnKITppOI_IvcXXDNrsc.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0100-024F, U+1E00-1EFF, U+20A0-20AB, U+20AD-20CF, U+2C60-2C7F, U+A720-A7FF;
}
/* latin */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Changa';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 300;
  src: local('Changa Light'), local('Changa-Light'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/changa/v2/g574OV_kPJGAg5xgvJqovFtXRa8TVwTICgirnJhmVJw.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215;
}
/* arabic */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Changa';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: local('Changa'), local('Changa-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/changa/v2/pI_yG9UUS9eQ4dbGOEVJY_esZW2xOQ-xsNqO47m55DA.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0600-06FF, U+200C-200E, U+2010-2011, U+FB50-FDFF, U+FE80-FEFC;
}
/* latin-ext */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Changa';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: local('Changa'), local('Changa-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/changa/v2/mgUIJ5rqNVIRrfFbcrxjg_esZW2xOQ-xsNqO47m55DA.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0100-024F, U+1E00-1EFF, U+20A0-20AB, U+20AD-20CF, U+2C60-2C7F, U+A720-A7FF;
}
/* latin */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Changa';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  src: local('Changa'), local('Changa-Regular'), url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/changa/v2/NiSJImda5f9NyXfUYMGTgQ.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2212, U+2215;
}

/* body
============ */
body {background:$(bg.color);color:#333;font:14px 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;}
ul {margin:0;padding:0;}
li {display: list-item;text-align: -webkit-match-parent;}
* {list-style:none;text-decoration:none;margin:0;padding:0;outline:0;-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;-moz-box-sizing: border-box;box-sizing: border-box;}
*, :before, :after {-webkit-box-sizing: border-box;-moz-box-sizing: border-box;box-sizing: border-box;}
a {color:$(a.color);font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;}
.clear {clear:both;}
.widget {margin: 0;}
.widget-item-control ,.blog-feeds , .date-header, .post-feeds, .status-msg-border {display:none;}
.widget .widget-item-control a img {display:none;}
.widget li, .BlogArchive #ArchiveList ul.flat li {padding: 0;}
.post-footer-line>* {margin-left: 0;}
.content-outer, .header-outer, .tabs-outer, .main-outer, .main-inner, .footer-outer, .post, .comments, .widget, .date-header, .inline-ad {position: relative;min-height: 0;_position: static;_height: 1%;}
.content-outer, .header-outer, .tabs-outer, .main-outer, .main-inner, .footer-outer, .post, .comments, .widget, .date-header, .inline-ad {position: relative;min-height: 0;_position: static;_height: 1%;}
html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code, del, dfn, em, font, ins, kbd, q, s, samp, small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var, dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li, fieldset, form, label, legend, table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td {border: 0;font-family:'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;font-size: 100%;font-style: inherit;color: inherit;font-weight: inherit;margin: 0;outline: 0;padding: 0;vertical-align: baseline;}
.container {width:1170px;margin:0 auto;overflow: hidden;}
/* تأثير
============ */
#menu-top ul li a, #social-media a, .post-title a, .pagenavi a, .copyrights a, .sidebar a, .contact-form-button, .follow-by-email-submit, .pagenavi a, .pagenavi span, .post-share a:hover, .list-label-widget-content li:hover,  .ish-services a:hover, .Sites-facebook:hover, .Sites-google-plus:hover, .Sites-youtube:hover, .Sites-blogger:hover, .sidebar .LinkList a:hover,  .index .post:hover, .t-menu a:hover, #wdbloogtab1 a:hover , #wdbloogtab2 a:hover, .label-size.label-size:hover, #sidebar2 .widget-content ul li a:hover,.item .post a:hover ,.static_page .post a:hover,.menu-wdbloog #nav li a:hover ,#openNavwd a:hover,.menu-wdbloog .home-icon:hover,.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa a:hover{transition: all .3s;-webkit-transition: all .3s;-o-transition: all .3s;-moz-transition: all .3s;}
/* قائمة
========= */
.brand-logo.rahil-logo{display:block;color:#fff;font-family:'Norican',cursive;font-size:40px;margin-right:55px;padding-top:14px;position:relative;padding:30px 0 0 0}
.valign{background-color:#333C44;min-height:150px;width:350px}
.valign span{display:block;color:#fff;font-size:20px;margin:0 55px 0 0;position:relative;padding:10px 0 15px 0;font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;}
.valign img{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;height:230px;opacity:0.2;display: none;}
.valign div{text-align:right;padding:10px 0;display:block;color:#fff;font-size:20px;margin:0 55px 0 0;position: relative;}
.valign div ul li a{font-size:15px}
.t-menu2{margin:0;padding:0;width: 100%;padding-top: 15px;}
.t-menu2 a {color: #000!important;float: right;font-size: 16px!important;font-weight: 500;width: 100%;padding-right: 20px!important;height: 50px;line-height: 45px;}
.t-menu2 a i {margin-left: 10px;}
.t-menu2 a:hover {color: $(s.color)!important;;}
.sidenav {height: 100%;width: 0;position: fixed;top: 0;right: 0;background-color: #FFF;overflow-x: hidden;transition: 0.5s;z-index: 99999999;}
.sidenav .closebtn {position: absolute;top: 15px;left: 15px;font-size: 23px;color: #fff;}
#sidebar2 .widget-content ul li a{color:#5F5F5F;font-size:16px;display:block;padding:10px 0;font-weight:500;margin-bottom:5px;background-color:#fff;padding-right:10px;border-right:7px solid transparent}
#sidebar2 .Label ul li a {
  width: 50%;
  float: right;
}
#sidebar2 .widget-content ul li a:hover {
background-color: #ddd;
border-right: 7px solid #EF5350;}

#sidebar2 .widget-content ul li a i{margin-left:15px}
#sidebar2 {overflow: hidden;}
#sidebar2 h2 {
  position: relative;
  display: block;
  margin: 10px 15px;
  font-size: 22px;
  padding: 8px 0;
  height: 50px;
  line-height: 25px;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-align: right!important;
  font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;
}
#sidebar2 .widget {margin-bottom: 20px;width: 342px;float: right;}
.Sites-wdbloog{float:right;position:relative;z-index:9}
.Sites-wdbloog li i {margin: 15px;cursor: pointer;}
.Sites-wdbloog li a{font-size:30px;color: #fff;}
#ContactForm1, #ContactForm1 br {
  display: block;
}
/* قائمة أسفل الهيدر
===================== */
#about{background-color:#333c44;height:280px;}
.vc_column-inner img {position: absolute;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 280px;top: 0;opacity: 0.2;display: none;}
.wpb_wrapper {position: absolute;width: 100%;text-align: center;top: 5%;}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa a:hover {
  background-color: #52b035!important;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-facebook a {
  background: #24458A;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #fff;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-google-plus a {
  background: #DD4B39;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #fff;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-instagram a {
  background: #659EB9;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #fff;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-blogger a {
  background: #FF5722;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 19px;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-blogger a i {
  margin-top: -3px;
}

.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-khamsat a {
  background: #F9B42D;
  border-radius: 2px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 19px;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-khamsat a i:before {
  content: "5";
  font-size: 20px;
  margin-top: -3px;
  display: block;
}
.shortcode-event-countdown .Sites-continuefa .Sites-twitter a {
  background: #1BB2E9;
}

/* قائمة رئيسية
=============== */
.menu-wdbloog {
  overflow: hidden;
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  background-color: #fff;
  width: 100%;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.23);
}
.menu.wdbloog2 {
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.menu-wdbloog .home-icon {
  float: right;
  padding: 0 15px;
  height: 60px;
  display: block;
  line-height: 60px;
  font-size: 25px;
}
.menu-wdbloog .home-icon:hover {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #52b035;
}
.menu-wdbloog #nav li {
  float: right;
}
.menu-wdbloog #nav li a {
  padding: 15px;
  display: block;
}
.menu-wdbloog #nav li a:hover {
color: #fff;
  background-color: #52b035;
}

#openNavwd a {
  float: left;
  padding: 0 15px;
  height: 60px;
  display: block;
  line-height: 60px;
  font-size: 25px;
}
#openNavwd a:hover {
color: #fff;
  background-color: #52b035;
}
#openNavwd a {
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* محرك البحث
=============== */
input.input-search2{padding:10px;border:navajowhite;font-size:15px;color:#000;text-align:center;width:100%;font-family:'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;line-height:30px;height:55px;background-color:#ddd;border-right:7px solid #EF5350}
/* التسميات
=========== */
.list-label-widget-content li a {color: #fff;}
.list-label-widget-content li span{float:left;margin-left:10px;color: #fff;}
.label-size.label-size {padding: 2px 10px;display: inline-block;border-radius: 2px;font-size: 16px;background-color: #D35400;width: 48%;margin: 3px 2px;text-align: center;height: 40px;line-height: 30px;}
.label-size.label-size:hover {background-color: $(s.color);}
.cloud-label-widget-content a {color: #fff;}
.label-count {color: #fff;margin-right: 5px;}
#Label1 .widget-title h2 {color: #D35400;}
#Label1 .widget-title h2:after{content:"\f07b";font-family:FontAwesome;background-color: #D35400;}
#Label1 .widget-title h2::before {background-color: #D35400;}
.AmniFrmt:first-child {z-index: 1;}
.AmniFrmt{position:absolute;z-index:2;display:block;height:35px;line-height:28px;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;background-color:$(s.color);top: 10px;right: -150px;transition: all 0.7s ease 0s;}
.AmniFrmt a {display: block;height: 100%;width: 100%;padding: 0px 10px;color: #fff;line-height: 35px;}
.AmniFrmt a i {padding-left: 8px;}
.post-outer:hover .AmniFrmt{right:10px}
.sepTItle{text-align:center;padding-bottom:15px;text-shadow:0 1px 0 black;color:#EF5350}
/* المواضيع
============ */
.index .post-wrapper{width:100%}
.post-wrapper{float:right;width:100%}
.item .container,.static_page .container{width:900px}
.item .menu-wdbloog .container, .static_page .menu-wdbloog .container {
  width: 1170px;
}
#post{overflow:hidden;width:100%}
.item .post-body{color:#000;text-align:justify!important;font-weight:500}
.posts-thumb{width:100%;height:215px;float:right;position:relative;overflow:hidden;background-color:#000}
.index .post-body img{height:100%}
.index .post{width:100%;float:right;height:293px;}
.post img{max-width:100%}
.index .post img{max-width:100%;width:100%;transition:all 0.7s ease 0s;position:relative}
.index .post-outer:hover .post img{opacity:0.5;transform:scale(1.3)}
.index .post-outer{overflow:hidden;float:right;border:5px solid #DDDDDD;width:25%;height:302px}
.item .post-outer,.static_page .post-outer{animation:none!important}
.index .post-meta span,.index .post-meta a{font-size:16px;color:#fff;text-transform:capitalize;height:30px;line-height:25px;font-weight:500}
.index .sosmed-list-p li a{text-align:center;float:right;line-height:5px!important;width:35px;height:35px!important;padding:10px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.23);color:$(s.color)!important}
.index .post-meta{text-align:center}
.index .post-timestamp{margin:0 15px}
.index .post-title{text-align:center;font-weight:bold}
.post-title a {font-weight: 500;font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;}
.index .post-outer:hover .post-title a {color: #DF504D;}
.index .post-info{background-color:#fff;padding:10px;overflow:hidden;transition:all 0.7s ease 0s;width:100%;display:inline-block;height:76px}
.post-summary{display:none}
.item .post{padding:10px;background-color:#fff;border: 1px solid #cccccc;margin-bottom:10px}
.item .post a,.static_page .post a {color:$(s.color);}
.item .post a:hover, .static_page .post a:hover {color: #52b035;}
.cover-post{padding:15px;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.23);margin:1px 1px 1px 1px;margin-bottom:10px}
.item .post-title {margin-bottom: 10px;padding-bottom: 5px;text-align: center;font-size: 30px;font-weight: 500;font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;color: #EF5350;}
.item .post-home{margin-left:5px}
.item .post-author.vcard{margin:0 5px}
.item .post-labels{margin:0 5px}
.item .post-Comment{margin:0 5px}
#lb-dislike-0{display:none}
#lb-like-0{background-color:#fff!important}
.item .post-meta{border-bottom:2px solid #5F5F5F;padding-bottom:18px;text-align: center;margin-bottom: 20px;}
.item .post-meta span,.item .post-meta a{color:#5F5F5F;font-size:16px;display:inline-block;text-transform:capitalize;font-weight: 500;}
.item .post-meta .post-timestamp{margin:0 5px}
.item .wdbloogidebartabs {display: none;}
.separator a {margin-left: 10px!important;margin-right: 0px!important;float: none!important;text-align: center!important;}
/* تعداد رقمي
================== */
.item .post ol ,.static_page .post ol {counter-reset:li;list-style:none;margin-top:6px}
.item .post ol li {
  position: relative;
  margin: 5px 0!important;
  padding: 10px 25px!important;
  text-indent: 14px;
  line-height: 15px;
}
.item .post ol li:before ,.static_page .post ol li:before {
  content: counter(li);
  counter-increment: li;
  position: absolute;
  right: 5px;
  width: 27px;
  text-indent: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
/* تعداد نقطي
================== */
.item .post ul li ,.static_page .post ul li{  position: relative;
  margin: 5px 0!important;
  padding: 5px 19px!important;
  text-indent: 14px;
  margin-right: 15px!important;}
.item .post ul li:before ,.static_page .post ul li:before {
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  padding: 3px;
  color: #000000;
  text-indent: 7px;
  border-radius: 0;
  margin-top: 5px;
  line-height: 31px;
  content: "\f111";
  font: normal normal normal 10px/1 FontAwesome;
}
/* عناوين
================== */
.post h3 {
  color: #EF5350;
  position: relative;
  display: block;
  font-size: 22px;
  padding: 8px 0;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-align: right!important;
  font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;
  margin-top: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}
.post h4 {
  color: #EF5350;
  position: relative;
  display: block;
  font-size: 22px;
  padding: 8px 0;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-align: right!important;
  font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;
  margin-top: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

/* اقتباس
================== */
.post blockquote{display:block;background:#eee;padding:15px 40px 15px 40px;margin:0 0 20px;position:relative;color:$(s.color);font-size:14px;border:1px solid $(s.color)}
.post blockquote::before{content:"\f10d";font-size:15px;position:absolute;left:10px;bottom:5px;font-family:FontAwesome;font-weight:100}
.post blockquote::after{content:"\f10e";font-size:15px;position:absolute;right:6px;top:13px;font-family:FontAwesome;font-weight:100}
/* ازرار التحميل
================== */
.btn-btn2{display:table;margin:0 auto}
#wrap{margin:20px auto;text-align:center}
a.btn{display:inline-block;position:relative;text-decoration:none;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:.5px;padding:10px 20px;margin:10px;color:$(s.color);font-size:16px;text-transform:uppercase;transition:all 0.3s ease-out;border:1px solid $(s.color);line-height:25px}
a.btn:hover {background: #30abd5;color: #fff!important;box-shadow: inset 0 -50px 0 #22313F;border: 1px solid #22313F;}
a.btn::before{color:$(s.color);display:-webkit-inline-box;content:"\f06e";font-family:fontawesome;margin:0 0 0 5px}
a.btn:hover::before{color:#fff}
a.btn2{display:inline-block;position:relative;text-decoration:none;font-weight:500;background:$(s.color);letter-spacing:.5px;padding:10px 20px;margin:10px;color:#fff!important;box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 #22313F;font-size:16px;text-transform:uppercase;border-radius:3px;transition:all 0.3s ease-out;line-height:25px}
a.btn2:hover{background:$(s.color);color:#fff;box-shadow:inset 0 -50px 0 #22313F}
a.btn2::before{color:#FFFFFF;display:-webkit-inline-box;content:"\f090";font-family:fontawesome;margin:0 0 0 5px}
#wdbloogbcoun{display:table;margin:auto}
/*Preview*/
#wdbloogdcount1{float:right;margin:10px auto 30px;width:200px}
#wdbloogdcount3{margin:10px auto 30px;width:200px}
#wdbloogdcount1 .cb1 a:hover{box-shadow:inset 0 -50px 0 #EF5350}
#wdbloogdcount1 .cb1 a{display:inline-block;position:relative;text-decoration:none;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:.5px;padding:10px 20px;color:#fff;font-size:16px;text-transform:uppercase;transition:all 0.3s ease-out;line-height:25px;width:200px;text-align:center;background-color:#22313F}
#wdbloogdcount1 .cb1 a::before{color:#fff;display:-webkit-inline-box;content:"\f06e";font-family:fontawesome;margin:0 0 0 5px}
#wdbloogdcount1 .cb2,#wdbloogdcount3 .cb2{background-color:#22313F;color:#fff;display:block;font-size:13px;height:0;opacity:0;position:absolute;text-align:center;transition:all 0.5s ease 0s;width:200px}
/*Download*/
#wdbloogdcount2{float:left;margin:10px auto 30px;width:200px}
#wdbloogdcount4{margin:10px auto 30px;width:200px}
#wdbloogdcount2 .cb1 a{display:inline-block;position:relative;text-decoration:none;font-weight:500;background:#EF5350;letter-spacing:.5px;padding:10px 20px;margin:0 0;color:#fff!important;box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 #22313F;font-size:16px;text-transform:uppercase;transition:all 0.3s ease-out;line-height:25px;width:200px;text-align:center;margin-right:5px}
#wdbloogdcount2 .cb1 a::before{color:#FFFFFF;display:-webkit-inline-box;content:"\f090";font-family:fontawesome;margin:0 0 0 5px}
#wdbloogdcount2 .cb1 a:hover{box-shadow:inset 0 -50px 0 #22313F}
#wdbloogdcount2 .cb2,#wdbloogdcount4 .cb2{background-color:#EF5350;color:#fff;display:block;font-size:13px;height:0;opacity:0;position:absolute;text-align:center;transition:all 0.5s ease 0s;width:200px;margin-right:5px}
/*Hover*/
#wdbloogdcount1:hover .cb2,#wdbloogdcount2:hover .cb2,#wdbloogdcount3:hover .cb2,#wdbloogdcount4:hover .cb2{height:24px;opacity:1}
/* صندوق الاكواد
================== */
pre {
  margin: .5em auto;
  white-space: pre;
  word-wrap: break-word;
  overflow: auto;
  background-color: #444;
  position: relative;
  padding: 55px 15px 10px 15px;
  width: 100%;
  tab-size: 2;
  word-break: normal;
  -webkit-user-select: text;
  max-height: 400px;
  color: #fff;
}
pre[data-codetype="CSSku"]:before,pre[data-codetype="HTMLku"]:before,pre[data-codetype="JavaScriptku"]:before,pre[data-codetype="JQueryku"]:before{background-color:#EEEEEE;box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 1px #ccc}
pre::before {
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 700;
  content: attr(title);
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  padding: 9px 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  color: #79798d;
  display: block;
  margin: 0;
  text-indent: 15px;
  line-height: 25px;
  height: 46px;
  background-color: #EEEEEE;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 1px #ccc;
}
pre:after{display:inline-block;content:"\f121";font-family:fontAwesome;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;font-size:18px;color:#79798d;top:0;left:0;padding:9px 14px;position:absolute;line-height:28px}
pre code{display:block;background:none;border:none;color:#FFFFFF;padding:25px 20px 20px 20px;font-size:16px;white-space:pre;overflow:auto;text-align:right;}
/* صندوق وسم
================== */
kbd {
  position: relative;
  color: #EF5350;
  margin: 0 5px 0 5px;
  line-height: 14px;
}
kbd:before{position:absolute;content:'اضغط مرتين لتحديد';display:table;bottom:40px;left:-20px;background:#EF5350;color:#fff;padding:5px 0 5px 13px;font-size:13px;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transform:scale(0.8);z-index:2;transition:all .3s;font-family:'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;}
kbd:hover:before{transform:scale(1.0);opacity:1;visibility:visible;transition:all .3s}
p,blockquote,pre,table,figure,hr,form,ol,ul,dl{margin:0}
hr{height:1px;border:none;background-color:#768187}
i.source span{font-size:small!important;-webkit-user-select:text;-khtml-user-select:text;-moz-user-select:text;-ms-user-select:text;user-select:text}
/* المشاركة عبر مواقع التواصل
============================= */
.post-share{text-align:center;background-color:#FFFFFF;padding:15px;z-index:999;margin:0 0 10px 0;border: 1px solid #cccccc;}
.post-share p {
  text-align: right;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 22px;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #cccccc;
  color: #EF5350;
}

a.a2a_dd{display:none}
.a2a_kit{display:table;margin:auto}
.a2a_svg{height:50px!important;line-height:32px!important;width:50px!important;margin-bottom:5px!important}

/* التالى والسابق
================== */
.item #blog-pager{text-align:center;clear:both}
.item .home-link{  display: none;}
.item .blog-pager-newer-link {background-color: $(s.color);color: #FFFFFF;font-weight: 500;height: 80px;float: left;position: fixed;top: 50%;right: 0;line-height: 94px;width: 35px;padding-right: 3px;font-size: 0;z-index: 99999;}
.item .blog-pager-newer-link:before{content:"\f061";font-family:fontawesome;margin-left:5px;line-height:27px;font-size: 20px;}
.item .blog-pager-older-link {background-color: $(s.color);color: #FFFFFF;font-weight: 500;height: 80px;float: left;position: fixed;top: 50%;left: 0;line-height: 94px;width: 35px;padding-right: 8px;font-size: 0;z-index: 99999;}
.item .blog-pager-older-link:before{content:"\f060";font-family:fontawesome;margin-left:5px;line-height:27px;font-size: 20px;}
.index #blog-pager-older-link a, .index .home-link {position: relative;background: #FFFFFF;display: inline-block;font-size: 16px;padding: 11px 15px;margin: 0 5px;transition: all .3s;font-weight: 500;box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.14),0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.12),0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);padding: 6.5px 15px;}
.index #blog-pager-older-link a:hover, .index .home-link:hover {background: $(s.color);color: #fff;}

.share-item.share a.button{color:#FFFFFF;padding:0;margin:0;display:block;line-height:40px;position:absolute;top:10px;width:35px;height:35px;left:-40px;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.23);background-color:$(s.color);transition: all 0.7s ease 0s;}

  padding: 10px;

.sosmed-list li a {width: 30px;height: 30px;text-align: center;line-height: 25px;font-size: 15px!important;display: block;color: #fff!important;transition: all .3s;}

============== */
::-webkit-scrollbar {width: 8px;background: #fff;}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {background: $(s.color);}
/* back-to-top
============== */
.smoothscroll-top{position:fixed;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;overflow:hidden;text-align:center;z-index:99;background-color:$(s.color);color:#fff;line-height:45px;right:10px;bottom:-25px;padding-top:2px;border-radius:50%;transition:all 0.5s ease-in-out;transition-delay:0.2s;font-weight:100;font-size:20px;width:56px;height:56px;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.23)}
.smoothscroll-top.show{visibility:visible;cursor:pointer;opacity:1;bottom:25px}
.smoothscroll-top i.fa{line-height:inherit}

/*مانع الأعلانات
============== */
#unblocker {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: #fff;
    opacity: .98;
    display: block;
    z-index: 9999;
    overflow: hidden;
}
#unblocker p {
    color: #000;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 15% auto;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    max-width: 750px;
    display: table;
    line-height: 1.5;
}
#unblocker p:before {
    content: '\f023';
    font-family: fontawesome;
    background: #ff675c;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    display: block;
    padding: 0;
    width: 2em;
    height: 2em;
    line-height: 2em;
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    clear: both;
    border-radius: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto 3%;
    font-weight: normal;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,.1);
}
#unblocker p:hover:before {
    content: '\f13e';
}










/* التجاوب
=========== */
.selectnav {display:none;}
#menubtn + label span::before {display: none;}
@media screen and (max-width : 1160px){
.container {width:95%;}
.item .menu-wdbloog .container, .static_page .menu-wdbloog .container {
  width: 95%;
}
}
@media screen and (max-width : 1024px){
.label-size.label-size {width: 100%;}
.container {width:95%;}
.item .container, .static_page .container {width: 95%;}
.inline-wd {
  width: 100%;
}
.post-wd {
  width: 33.3333%;
}
.index .post-outer {
  width: 33.3333%;
}
.dsbygoogle-src3h {
  max-width: 100%;
}
}
@media screen and (max-width : 900px){
.index .post-outer {width: 50%;}
.item .post-wrapper {float: none;width: 100%;}
.static_page .post-wrapper {float: none;width: 100%;}
.search-elprof {margin: 200px 50px auto;}
.input-search {width: 79%;font-size: 15px;}
#searchgo {width: 20%;}
.image img {width: 100%;}
.dsbygoogle-src5 {display:none}
.menu.section #nav {
  display: none;
}
.selectnav {
  display: inline-block;
  float: right;
  padding: 3px;
  margin-top: 10px;
  font-family: 'Changa',Droid Arabic Naskh;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.inline-wd {
  width: 100%;
}
.post-wd {
  width: 50%;
}
.menu-wdbloog #nav {
  display: none;
}
.menu.wdbloog2 {
  width: 100%;
}
.footer-logo h1 {
  margin-top: 50px;
}
}
@media screen and (max-width : 700px){

.index .post-outer {width: 50%;}
.item ins.adsbygoogle, .static_page ins.adsbygoogle {
  float: none !important;
}
#recent-layout2{display:none}
.smoothscroll-top.show{display:none}
.type-wrap{display:none}
.wpb_wrapper{top:0}
.footer-logo a{padding:35px 0 0 0}
#about{height:250px}
.vc_column-inner img{height:180px}
.item .blog-pager-newer-link{display:none}
.item .blog-pager-older-link{display:none}
.cmm-tabs-header{display:none}
.comment_body{margin-right:0;width:100%}
.comment_header{float:none;display:table;margin:auto;margin-bottom:10px}
.comment_name{text-align:center}
.comment_service{float:none}
.comment-delete{float:none}

.item .google-item,.static_page .google-item {
  display: none;
}
.item .google-item2,.static_page .google-item2 {
  display: block;
}

}
@media screen and (max-width : 600px){
.index .post-outer {width: 50%;}
}
@media screen and (max-width : 450px){
.footer-logo2 {font-size: 50px!important;}
.index .post-outer {width: 100%;padding-left: 0;padding-right: 0;}
.inline-wd {
  width: 100%;
}
.post-wd {
  width: 100%;
}
.copyrights #LinkList2 li {
  width: 100%;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
}



/* Layout
================== */
#layout .container{width:800px}
#layout li {
  list-style: none;
}
#layout .menu-wdbloog {
  display: none;
}

    (function() {
      var items = ;
      var msgs = ;
      var config = ;

// 
      var cursor = null;
      if (items && items.length > 0) {
        cursor = parseInt(items[items.length - 1].timestamp) + 1;
      }

      var bodyFromEntry = function(entry) {
        if (entry.gd$extendedProperty) {
          for (var k in entry.gd$extendedProperty) {
            if (entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name == 'blogger.contentRemoved') {
              return '<span class="deleted-comment">' + entry.content.$t + '</span>';
            }
          }
        }
        return entry.content.$t;
      }

      var parse = function(data) {
        cursor = null;
        var comments = [];
        if (data && data.feed && data.feed.entry) {
          for (var i = 0, entry; entry = data.feed.entry[i]; i++) {
            var comment = {};
            // comment ID, parsed out of the original id format
            var id = /blog-(\d+).post-(\d+)/.exec(entry.id.$t);
            comment.id = id ? id[2] : null;
            comment.body = bodyFromEntry(entry);
            comment.timestamp = Date.parse(entry.published.$t) + '';
            if (entry.author && entry.author.constructor === Array) {
              var auth = entry.author[0];
              if (auth) {
                comment.author = {
                  name: (auth.name ? auth.name.$t : undefined),
                  profileUrl: (auth.uri ? auth.uri.$t : undefined),
                  avatarUrl: (auth.gd$image ? auth.gd$image.src : undefined)
                };
              }
            }
            if (entry.link) {
              if (entry.link[2]) {
                comment.link = comment.permalink = entry.link[2].href;
              }
              if (entry.link[3]) {
                var pid = /.*comments\/default\/(\d+)\?.*/.exec(entry.link[3].href);
                if (pid && pid[1]) {
                  comment.parentId = pid[1];
                }
              }
            }
            comment.deleteclass = 'item-control blog-admin';
            if (entry.gd$extendedProperty) {
              for (var k in entry.gd$extendedProperty) {
                if (entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name == 'blogger.itemClass') {
                  comment.deleteclass += ' ' + entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].value;
                } else if (entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].name == 'blogger.displayTime') {
                  comment.displayTime = entry.gd$extendedProperty[k].value;
                }
              }
            }
            comments.push(comment);
          }
        }
        return comments;
      };

      var paginator = function(callback) {
        if (hasMore()) {
          var url = config.feed + '?alt=json&v=2&orderby=published&reverse=false&max-results=50';
          if (cursor) {
            url += '&published-min=' + new Date(cursor).toISOString();
          }
          window.bloggercomments = function(data) {
            var parsed = parse(data);
            cursor = parsed.length < 50 ? null
                : parseInt(parsed[parsed.length - 1].timestamp) + 1
            callback(parsed);
            window.bloggercomments = null;
          }
          url += '&callback=bloggercomments';
          var script = document.createElement('script');
          script.type = 'text/javascript';
          script.src = url;
          document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);
        }
      };
      var hasMore = function() {
        return !!cursor;
      };
      var getMeta = function(key, comment) {
        if ('iswriter' == key) {
          var matches = !!comment.author
              && comment.author.name == config.authorName
              && comment.author.profileUrl == config.authorUrl;
          return matches ? 'true' : '';
        } else if ('deletelink' == key) {
          return config.baseUri + '/delete-comment.g?blogID='
               + config.blogId + '&postID=' + comment.id;
        } else if ('deleteclass' == key) {
          return comment.deleteclass;
        }
        return '';
      };

      var replybox = null;
      var replyUrlParts = null;
      var replyParent = undefined;

      var onReply = function(commentId, domId) {
        if (replybox == null) {
          // lazily cache replybox, and adjust to suit this style:
          replybox = document.getElementById('comment-editor');
          if (replybox != null) {
            replybox.height = '250px';
            replybox.style.display = 'block';
            replyUrlParts = replybox.src.split('#');
          }
        }
        if (replybox && (commentId !== replyParent)) {
          replybox.src = '';
          document.getElementById(domId).insertBefore(replybox, null);
          replybox.src = replyUrlParts[0]
              + (commentId ? '&parentID=' + commentId : '')
              + '#' + replyUrlParts[1];
          replyParent = commentId;
        }
      };

      var hash = (window.location.hash || '#').substring(1);
      var startThread, targetComment;
      if (/^comment-form_/.test(hash)) {
        startThread = hash.substring('comment-form_'.length);
      } else if (/^c[0-9]+$/.test(hash)) {
        targetComment = hash.substring(1);
      }

      // Configure commenting API:
      var configJso = {
        'maxDepth': config.maxThreadDepth
      };
      var provider = {
        'id': config.postId,
        'data': items,
        'loadNext': paginator,
        'hasMore': hasMore,
        'getMeta': getMeta,
        'onReply': onReply,
        'rendered': true,
        'initComment': targetComment,
        'initReplyThread': startThread,
        'config': configJso,
        'messages': msgs
      };

      var render = function() {
        if (window.goog && window.goog.comments) {
          var holder = document.getElementById('comment-holder');
          window.goog.comments.render(holder, provider);
        }
      };

      // render now, or queue to render when library loads:
      if (window.goog && window.goog.comments) {
        render();
      } else {
        window.goog = window.goog || {};
        window.goog.comments = window.goog.comments || {};
        window.goog.comments.loadQueue = window.goog.comments.loadQueue || [];
        window.goog.comments.loadQueue.push(render);
      }
    })();

      var pres = document.getElementsByTagName("pre");
      for (var i = 0; i < pres.length; i++) {
        pres[i].addEventListener("dblclick", function () {
          var selection = getSelection();
          var range = document.createRange();
          range.selectNodeContents(this);
          selection.removeAllRanges();
          selection.addRange(range);
        }, false);
      }
